node.title: Muhammad Rehan Saeed: Developer at Microsoft | Leonardo Tuna Podcast
node.description: I did a fun podcast episode with Leonardo Tuna. We talked about the difficulty of getting a job at Microsoft, some of my work there, JavaScript frontend frameworks, Vue vs React and my interesting experiences writing software for education at Bridge International Academies.

node.title: So I've Been Awarded Microsoft MVP Status!
node.description: Muhammad Rehan Saeed has been awarded Microsoft MVP (Most Valuable Professional) status.

node.title: Configuration File Transforms In Visual Studio Should Be Built In
node.description: Configuration File Transforms can be done with the Slow Cheetah Visual Studio extension by Sayed Hashimi. This feature should be built into Visual Studio.
